      • build

        public APIHttpClient build()
                    throws APIException,
                           URISyntaxException
        Build the HttpClient shared instance. Available via getClient().
        Returns:
        the client
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - if URIBuilder throws an exception with the host
        APIException - If there is a problem building the HttpClient
